## Hi! I'm Thom

I'm doing a PhD on **synthetic data** and **privacy-preserving statistics**, which is just a fancy way of saying I make fake data that looks real. 
Besides, I procrastinate by reading on Bayesian methods, marginally improving my R packages or giving workshops on any these topics.

If you want to **collaborate**, check out my [GitHub](https://github.com/thomvolker){target="_blank"} for active projects.
I work, among other things, on [synthetic data](https://github.com/thomvolker/Synthemice), [differential privacy](https://gist.github.com/thomvolker/13fe1b3efb1988ab4ecb2a9664534f36), [missing data imputation](https://amices.org/mice), Bayesian hypothesis testing ([here](https://psycnet.apa.org/fulltext/2024-05522-001.html) and [here](https://thomvolker.github.io/bf-power-ttest/bayes-ttest-power.html)) and [density ratio estimation](https://thomvolker.github.io/densityratio){target="_blank"}. 
If I don't answer your email, I'm probably riding my bike. Sorry!
